description: Humorous story about a robot's reaction to being annoyed.
title: Robo Rage
n_1: Robo the robot stands calmly, Tinker approaches with curiosity.
c2_1: Hey Robo, what do these do?
n_2: Tinker starts pressing buttons on Robo.
n_3: Robo's eyes glow red as Tinker presses another button.
n_4: Robo chases Tinker playfully as he laughs.
c1_4: I will catch you, button pusher!
